about1: Hi, I'm Mateo Ozino, Front End Web Developer. I've always been very close to technology, I find it a very interesting world full of opportunities. But it wasn't until 2021 that I decided to get into it.
about2: I am currently pursuing a degree in computer science at the University of Buenos Aires, where I am learning about the theoretical and practical foundations of programming, data analysis, artificial intelligence and system design.
about3: In addition, I have completed several courses and certifications in web development, both front-end and back-end, using tools such as MariaDB, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python and Django.
about4: My goal is to continue training and expanding my knowledge and skills in these areas, as well as in other areas related to web application development.
